text: Federica Stufi (22 March 1988 Firenze) is an Italian volleyball player. She plays for the Italy women's national volleyball team. == Career == She participated in the 2017 FIVB Volleyball World Grand Prix. == Clubs == {| !Year !Country !Club |- |2004-2006||||Club Italia |- |2006-2008||||Esperia Cremona |- |2008-2009||||Chieri Volley |- |2009-2010||||River Volley Piacenza |- |2010-2011||||Volleyball Santa Croce |- |2011-2012||||MC-Carnaghi Villa Cortese |- |2013-2014||||Foppapedretti Bergamo |- |2014-2016||||Savino Del Bene Scandicci |- |2016- ||||Unedo Yamamay Busto |} == References == == External links == * Player profile, FIVB * Player profile, CEV * Player profile legavolleyfemminile.it * * * * Frederica Stufi, Getty Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Italian women's volleyball players Category:Serie A1 (women's volleyball) players Category:Universiade gold medalists for Italy Category:Universiade medalists in volleyball Category:Medalists at the 2009 Summer Universiade
title: Federica Stufi
